name: Space War (itch) (Arpan Neupane)
description:
Game Description:

This is SPACE WAR. You have 5 lives in this game, your goal is to destroy enemy space ships before they destroy you. If you destroy them before them come to the bottom of the screen, you move on to the next level. If you destroy all of them except for some that came to the bottom you loose lives depending on how much you failed to destroy. You have a health bar below your space ship to see how long you can last. You shoot lasers to destroy them and they shoot lasers to destroy you.

Input:

W: Makes you move up

A: Makes you move to the left

S: Makes you move down

D: Makes you move to the right

From the developer:

If you have any questions or comments please email me at arpanneupane19@gmail.com

HAVE FUN PLAYING!
